message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.DS

Reasoning: The paper introduces a class of learning problems and provides algorithms for solving them, which suggests that it belongs to the machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories. The use of a decision theoretic setting and multi-stage stochastic game also suggests that it could belong to the robotics (cs.RO) and control systems (cs.SY) sub-categories. Finally, the paper discusses the problem of lifelong learning in uncertain environments, which could also place it in the data structures (cs.DS) sub-category.
